24 -class RadioEnvironment(object): 

25      """ 
26      Base class for radio environment models. 
27   
28      @ivar receivers: list of potential receivers 
29      """ 
30   
31      __metaclass__ = ABCMeta 
32   

33 -    def __init__(self): 

34          """ 
35          Construct radio environment model. 
36          """ 
37          self.receivers = set()

41          """ 
42          Simulate transmitting a packet in the environment.

49 -class IdealRadioEnvironment(RadioEnvironment): 

50      """ 
51      An ideal radio channel where all packet transmissions are successful. 
52      """ 
53   

54 -    def __init__(self): 

55          RadioEnvironment.__init__(self) 

56   

57 -    def transmit(self, transmitter, packet): 

58          txChannel = getattr(transmitter, 'channel', None) 
59          for receiver in self.receivers: 
60              rxEnabled = getattr(receiver, '_receiverEnabled', True) 
61              rxChannel = getattr(receiver, 'channel', None) 
62              if rxEnabled and txChannel == rxChannel and receiver is not transmitter: 
63                  receiver.handlePacket(packet) 

64   

65 -class BERRadioEnvironment(IdealRadioEnvironment): 

66      """ 
67      Radio channel with a constant bit error rate. 
68   
69      Packets will be dropped at random with a probability dependent on their 
70      length and the BER of the environment. 
71      """ 

72 -    def __init__(self, ber, seed=None): 

73          """ 
74          Construct BER radio environment model. 
75   
76          @param ber: Probability of error in a single bit. 
77          @param seed: Seed value for randomisation. 
78          """ 
79          RadioEnvironment.__init__(self) 
80          self.ber = ber 
81          self.rng = np.random.RandomState(seed=seed) 

82   

83 -    def transmit(self, transmitter, packet): 

84          lossProbability = 1 - (1 - self.ber)**(packet.bytes*8) 
85          if self.rng.uniform(0,1) > lossProbability: 
86              IdealRadioEnvironment.transmit(self, transmitter, packet)
